bullet.title: Galaxy
bullet.description: This is my first android VR game after I have learned some Unity skill sets from Dylan Fries's Unity workshops. I made it just similar to the old school game - Galaxy On Fire. The game is also launched on Google Play Store, please click to find the link.

bullet.title: IpAddressAnalyzer
bullet.description: I made this WinForm project to help other students in learning how to analyze IPv4 addresses

bullet.title: MoneyManage
bullet.description: I made the app after I finished the BIT's first term at Red River College, using the knowledge from Financial Accounting and Java programming class. I use the app to manage my daily transaction.

bullet.title: jimmyvo2410.github.io
bullet.description: The project is about my solutions to online portfolio, carrer blogs, generating resume from xml database. The approach includes web technology and Document .Net from Sautinsoft

bullet.title: ObjectOrientationEstimationSystem
bullet.description: Matlab Modeling and simulating KF (Kalman Filter), EKF (Extended Kalman Filter) and other optimization approaches on Object Orientation Estimation System

bullet.title: SenseIMU
bullet.description: Control a mouse by human gesture via Bluetooth - A demonstration of Extended Kalman Filter and other different optimization and estimation approaches.

bullet.title: VNDPlay
bullet.description: A pet project that includes some fun games (snake, sudoku) with other Bluetooth applications controlled by touch-screen LCD, joysticks, buttons and tilting the device.

bullet.title: RaspiBot
bullet.description: A remote controlled 4-wheel robot can perform face recognition and camera stabilization. It can be controlled by either an android application via Bluetooth or website via web server.

bullet.title: UltrasonicRobot
bullet.description: A remote-controlled 4-wheel robot detect obstacles with 2 ultrasonic sensors.
